5944 - Jewellery Stores Summary > CHAUMET AUSTRALIA PTY LIMITED is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover jewellery stores. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. CHAUMET AUSTRALIA PTY LIMITED is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by director Brett Anthony Schmidt. For the 2023 financial year, the company reported revenue of $30.30 million. Its net loss totalled $165,000. CHAUMET AUSTRALIA PTY LIMITED forms part of the retail trade industry sector.
